################
# THING ENTITY #
################

# Thing ID (do not change! It will only be generated by the system)
thing_id=1612154

# Mandatory

thing_name=Thing Name Test 4 Updated 1
thing_description=Thing Description Updated 1
thing_url=https://scratchpad.sensorup.com/OGCSensorThings/v1.0/Things

# Optional

property_name=Property Name 1 Update 1
property_description=Property Description 1 Updated 1

property_name=Property Name 2 updated 1
property_description=Property Description 2 Updated 1

###################
# LOCATION ENTITY #
###################

# Location ID (do not change! It will only be generated by the system)
location_id=1608051

location_url=https://scratchpad.sensorup.com/OGCSensorThings/v1.0/Locations

# Insert "True" (without double quote) if you want to include Locations when you create a thing, otherwise insert "False" (without double
quote).

add_location=False

# Insert "new location" (without double quote) if you want to define a new location or "existing location" (without double quote) if you want to use existing location entity existed in the server.

location_source=new location

# Insert variables below if you want to define a new location, otherwise leave it blank

location_name=Location Name 1
location_description=Location Description 1
location_longitude=1
location_latitude=1

#####################
# DATASTREAM ENTITY #
#####################

# Add as many as datastream that are needed to be connected to the thing
# Insert "True" (without double quote) if you want to include Datastreams when you create a thing, otherwise insert "False" (without double quote)

add_datastream=False
datastream_name=Datastream Name
datastream_description=Datastream Description
datastream_observation_type=Datastream Observation Type
unit_of_measurement_name=Unit of Measurement Name
unit_of_measurement_symbol=Unit of Measurement Symbol
unit_of_measurement_definition=Unit of Measurement Definition

#####################
# OBSERVED PROPERTY #
#####################

observed_property_name=Observed Property Name
observed_property_description=Observed Property Description
observed_property_definition=Observed Property Definition

##########
# SENSOR #
##########

sensor_name=Sensor Name
sensor_description=Sensor Description
sensor_encoding_type=application/pdf
sensor_metadata=Sensor Metadata
